title: Bug 6304: Unable to synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the context menu does not display the Team entry.
EB: The Team entry should be present in the context menu when attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the file explorer. 
2. Navigate to the location of a .java file and another resource. 
3. Right-click on the .java file and another resource. 
4. Observe the context menu and check if the Team entry is present.
